definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Quasiconvex functions are studied by applying nearly convexity of sets.
sentences.chinese: 用集合的近似凸性研究函数的拟凸性。

sentences.english: Quasiconvex functions are studied by applying nearly convexity of sets.
sentences.chinese: 用集合的近似凸性研究函数的拟凸性。

sentences.english: A measure for the prominence of a corner is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 对如何测量角点凸性进行了详细介绍。

sentences.english: Convexity can be solved by positivity.
sentences.chinese: 凸性可以通过正性来解决。

sentences.english: Therefore, the research of pointwise properties showed the great significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此，点态凸性的研究有重要的意义。

sentences.english: And the gluten quantity had the same curve in shape but increasing continuously.
sentences.chinese: 面筋的数量呈现不断增加的凸性曲线变化规律。

sentences.english: Weak duality theorem is established under generalized convexity conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在广义凸性条件下，建立了弱对偶性定理。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
eigenvector (math.)/also written 特徵向量|特征向量
